metadata.title: CVE-2018-8011 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
By specially crafting HTTP requests, the mod_md challenge handler woulddereference a NULL pointer and cause the child process to segfault. Thiscould be used to DoS the server. Fixed in Apache HTTP Server 2.4.34(Affected 2.4.33).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
apache2-bin - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
apache2-data - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
apache2-utils - 2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.29-1ubuntu4.2').
